channel.title: TrisidiaX Client Problem - Need HELP ! :D -
channel.description:
I'm really new and just wanted to get a server+client with some content to mess around with and learn from.
I know a few errors here and there and how to fix them, but I'm not sure on what to do on this one, even though it seems like an easy fix to the right mind :)
[img]http://puu.sh/1svXM[/img]
Now, I've set the max errors in the compiler to 20 and that is what I got. Signlink.java/class is in the sign folder and the imports are leading right to the signlink folder in Client.java...
So I'm really stuck and could use some nice help from a more experienced Moparian :D Thanks guys!

item.title: TrisidiaX Client Problem - Need HELP ! :D -
